name: Clone in SourceTree
body:
## About

Ever wanted to quickly access github repositories from [SourceTree](http://www.sourcetreeapp.com/)? This small plugin adds a 'Clone in SourceTree' button to github, allowing cloning of a repo with just two clicks.

Available for Google Chrome and Safari.

## Download

[Google Chrome plugin](https://github.com/downloads/fourplusone/clone-in-sourcetree/Clone%20in%20SourceTree%20Chrome.crx)

[Sarari plugin](https://github.com/downloads/fourplusone/clone-in-sourcetree/Clone%20in%20SourceTree.safariextz)

[Source](https://github.com/fourplusone/clone-in-sourcetree)
tagline: Adds a "Clone in SourceTree" button to Github
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
